data.actual_result: On Light theme, it doesn't highlight at all.
data.expected_result: Upon long-holding, it should highlight the options, like dark theme.
data.short_description: The new invite model on 7.9.6 doesn't highlight when long-pressed on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on light theme, and scroll all the way down to the + button. - Click on it, and long-hold the "Create a server" or "Join a server" (You must have the new invite model screen).
